#include <bits/stdc++.h>
typedef uint64_t obj_id_t;

class CacheManager {
private:
    std::list<obj_id_t> lru_list;
    std::unordered_map<obj_id_t, std::list<obj_id_t>::iterator> map;

public:
    bool find(obj_id_t obj_id) {
        auto it = map.find(obj_id);
        if (it == map.end()) return false;
        lru_list.erase(it->second);
        lru_list.push_front(obj_id);
        map[obj_id] = lru_list.begin();
        return true;
    }

    void insert(obj_id_t obj_id, uint64_t obj_size) {
        // Ignore obj_size for pure LRU
        (void)obj_size; 
        
        if (map.count(obj_id)) {
            lru_list.erase(map[obj_id]);
        }
        lru_list.push_front(obj_id);
        map[obj_id] = lru_list.begin();
    }

    obj_id_t evict() {
        if (lru_list.empty()) return 0;
        obj_id_t victim = lru_list.back();
        lru_list.pop_back();
        map.erase(victim);
        return victim;
    }
};

#include <cstdint>
#include <unordered_map>
#include <set>

typedef uint64_t obj_id_t;

// LFU+Size-aware: break ties with object size (prefer to evict larger objects if frequency is equal)
class CacheManager {
private:
    struct Node {
        uint64_t freq;
        uint64_t timestamp;
        uint64_t obj_size;
        obj_id_t obj_id;
        bool operator<(const Node& rhs) const {
            if (freq != rhs.freq) return freq < rhs.freq;
            if (obj_size != rhs.obj_size) return obj_size > rhs.obj_size; // Evict larger object first on freq tie
            if (timestamp != rhs.timestamp) return timestamp < rhs.timestamp;
            return obj_id < rhs.obj_id;
        }
    };

    std::unordered_map<obj_id_t, std::set<Node>::iterator> obj2iter;
    std::unordered_map<obj_id_t, uint64_t> obj2size;
    std::set<Node> nodes;
    uint64_t timestamp = 0;

public:
    bool find(obj_id_t obj_id) {
        auto it = obj2iter.find(obj_id);
        if (it == obj2iter.end()) return false;
        Node node = *(it->second);
        nodes.erase(it->second);
        node.freq += 1;
        node.timestamp = ++timestamp;
        auto new_it = nodes.insert(node).first;
        obj2iter[obj_id] = new_it;
        obj2size[obj_id] = node.obj_size;
        return true;
    }

    void insert(obj_id_t obj_id, uint64_t obj_size) {
        auto it = obj2iter.find(obj_id);
        if (it != obj2iter.end()) {
            find(obj_id);
            return;
        }
        Node node{1, ++timestamp, obj_size, obj_id};
        auto set_it = nodes.insert(node).first;
        obj2iter[obj_id] = set_it;
        obj2size[obj_id] = obj_size;
    }

    obj_id_t evict() {
        if (nodes.empty()) return 0;
        auto it = nodes.begin();
        obj_id_t victim = it->obj_id;
        nodes.erase(it);
        obj2iter.erase(victim);
        obj2size.erase(victim);
        return victim;
    }
};
